far_field = 17                              # distance of points from antenna in the far field
number_points = 11                          # number of points per path
height  = [0,3,4,7]                    # number of vertical meters BELOW the antenna
number_paths = 4                            # Number of paths to be run


[[17.0, 0.0, 60], [17.0, 0.0, 48], [17.0, 0.0, 36], [17.0, 0.0, 24], [17.0, 0.0, 12], [17.0, 0.0, 0], [17.0, 0.0, 12], [17.0, 0.0, 24], [17.0, 0.0, 36], [17.0, 0.0, 48], [17.0, 0.0, 60], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 60], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 48], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 36], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 24], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 12], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 0], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 12], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 24], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 36], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 48], [17.26267650163207, 10.00797980144134, 60], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 60], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 48], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 36], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 24], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 12], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 0], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 12], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 24], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 36], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 48], [17.464249196572982, 13.240519915187205, 60], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 60], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 48], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 36], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 24], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 12], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 0], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 12], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 24], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 36], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 48], [18.384776310850235, 22.380135051959574, 60]]
